source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_00<tab>Myste has been waiting for you for a long time.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_00<tab>モグモグホームのミストは、次の人助けを始めたいようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_01<tab>Although Sidurgu has yet to recover from his injuries, Myste will wait no longer. He wants to resume his search for souls in need of succor, and he is willing to forgo their assistance, if you are. Anything to hasten the conclusion of this mad crusade. Castrum Oriens, the site of Ilberd's grand slaughter, may offer what you seek.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_01<tab>ミストから、ふたりで次の人助けに行くことを提案された。ギラバニア辺境地帯のカストルム・オリエンスにいる「ミスト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_02<tab>Myste grows weary at the sight of so many men and women willing to give their lives in service to a greater cause. A sight that is all too familiar, perhaps. Elsewhere shall we look for listless spirits.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_02<tab>ミストから、基地内に助けられそうな人はいないと言われた。ギラバニア辺境地帯のパイクフォールズで、元気のない人を探そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_03<tab>In the depths of a cave by a flickering fire, a man sits alone, waiting to die. Gallien, an Ala Mhigan refugee for whom you once made medicine long, long ago, reveals that he shared it with another refugee, ensuring that the man lived...and that he would not. His friend Houdart went on to fight for the Griffin and even served as his body double, but ultimately died at Baelsar's Wall with his mad master and so many others. They made their choices, and such are the consequences, but Myste cannot help but meddle. He conjures a simulacrum of Houdart to comfort the dying man, who bids his dead friend to go to Rhalgr's Reach and pray for their fallen brothers.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_03<tab>弱りきっているガリエンを見つけた。パイクフォールズの「フーダルト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_04<tab>The shade born of Gallien's memories tells you of how he always wanted to meet you, a larger-than-life hero...unaware that he eventually did at Little Ala Mhigo. He laments his fate, wishing he could go back and convince his former self not to place his trust in the Griffin...but if such things were possible, you wouldn't have a broken shield, now would you?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_04<tab>フーダルトを、ラールガーズリーチまで護ることになった。ギラバニア辺境地帯のストライプヒルズを進み、妨害を退けて、「フーダルト」を救助しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_05<tab>You rescue Houdart and Myste from wild beasts, but though they are unharmed, the shade abruptly stumbles and grips his head. Dizziness, he claims, and nothing more, before imploring you to hurry. He is as poor a liar as the boy.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_05<tab>フーダルトを救助した。再びストライプヒルズを進み、「フーダルト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_06<tab>Again Houdart falters, suddenly weak and in pain. A man's memories cannot outlive him, he says, and Gallien is running out of time. He will try his best to carry on, but in the end, it is not up to him...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_06<tab>フーダルトと話した。さらにストライプヒルズを進み、「フーダルト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_07<tab>Look how he burns with fervor, with desperation, with faith. How he sings of his homeland and wills himself to stand. How he marshals his strength to put one foot in front of the other. In that moment he lives again.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_07<tab>フーダルトと話したが、かなり不安定な様子だった。もう一度ストライプヒルズを進み、「ミスト」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_08<tab>The spell is broken. Houdart is no more, which can only mean one thing: we are one step closer to ending this charade.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_08<tab>ミストと話し、フーダルトが消えてしまったことを知った。ストライプヒルズの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA65B01 /var>」に「ソウルイーター」を使い、エーテルを回収しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_09<tab><var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> is not the first, nor will <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> be the last to betray you. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> will implore you to see reason, to seek solace in the fiction. And when you refuse, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> will have no recourse but one. As I did not. Be ready.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_09<tab>エーテルを回収した。ラールガーズリーチの「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA65C01 /var>」に、エモート「黙祷」をしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_10<tab>The dead are forever beyond our reach, and we have no choice but to accept the inevitability that everyone we know and love will join them in time...or do we? Distraught by his failure to see Gallien's final wish fulfilled before his passing, Myste muses on the possibility of a world where time and death hold no power of us. A world you could share. You need only ask. But we know better.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_10<tab>黙祷を捧げた。イシュガルドの忘れられた騎士亭にいる「シドゥルグ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_11Sidurgu is concerned that Myste's failure will spur him to deeper depths of depression. Even more concerning is the fact that the boy has yet to return to Ishgard, though you believed he would. Why, I do not know. The aether wanes, and he has but one chance left. Be ready, damn you. Be ready.

※The next dark knight quest will be available from Sidurgu upon reaching level 70.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SEQ_11シドゥルグに顛末を報告した。まだ謎の残るミストだが、忘れられた騎士亭に戻ってきていないようだ……。しばし、彼の帰還を待とう。

※暗黒騎士のレベルが70以上になると、忘れられた騎士亭のシドゥルグから次の暗黒騎士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Myste at Castrum Oriens.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_00<tab>カストルム・オリエンスのミストと話す

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_01<tab>Search the Fringes for people in distress.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_01<tab>パイクフォールズで元気のない人を探す

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Houdart.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_02<tab>フーダルトと話す

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_03<tab>Follow Houdart.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_03<tab>妨害を退け、フーダルトを救助

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_04<tab>Follow Houdart.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_04<tab>フーダルトと話す

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_05<tab>Follow Houdart.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_05<tab>フーダルトと再度話す

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Myste.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_06<tab>ミストと話す

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_07<tab>Use Souleater to consume the swirling abyss.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_07<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA65B01 /var>に「ソウルイーター」を使う

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_08<tab>Pay /respect to the fallen at Bloodstorm.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_08<tab>ラールガーズリーチの<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA65C01 /var>に「黙祷」をする

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_09<tab>Speak with Sidurgu in Ishgard.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_TODO_09<tab>イシュガルドのシドゥルグと話す

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_000<tab>I wasn't joking, by the way. About the moogle punching.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_000お前のソウルクリスタルに、エーテルが戻っているならいい。
だが、ここにきてこんな傷を負うとはな……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_RIELLE_000_005<tab>He'll heal, but I'm afraid it's going to take a while. The moogles can probably help, though Sid would have to let them─and good luck convincing him.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_RIELLE_000_005シドゥルグにとって、師匠さんがどれだけ強かったか……
手当てしてると、よくわかるよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_010<tab>As you can see, Sid has yet to fully recover from his bout with Ser Ompagne, and there is no telling how much more time he will require.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_010)) (( )) 02 /var>、あのね……
師匠さんにやられたシドゥルグの怪我、
まだ、あまりよくない、みたい……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_011<tab>But my quest will brook no delay. If we must seek out another soul in need of succor without their assistance, then so be it. Do you agree?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_011ぼく、人助け、がんばりたい。
だけど、シドゥルグが苦しいのは、よくない……。
だから、今回はぼくとふたりで、行ってくれませんか……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_012<tab>Then we are of one mind. Now then, where shall we begin our search...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_012ありがとう……。
でも、どこに行ったらいいのかな……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_013<tab>War is perhaps the greatest source of man's misery. So much death and destruction... A battlefield, perhaps...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_013おおきな戦いが、おきた場所なら、
ぼくの「ちから」で元気あげられるひと、いる……？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_014<tab>Yes, yes... This slaughter you bore witness to at Castrum Oriens is precisely that of which I speak. A tragedy which tore apart the lives of every man and woman it touched...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_014……ギラバ、ニア？
その「カストルム・オリエンス」って場所のそばで、
前に、おおきな戦いが、あったんだね……？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_015<tab>My mind is made up. That is where we must go.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_015うん……いってみる……！
)) (( )) 02 /var>、どうぞ、よろしくおねがいします。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_016<tab><sigh> If I had it my way, I'd not let you out of my sight...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_016まったく……。
ガキにまで気を使わせるとは、我ながら情けない……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_100_016<tab>But, again, it's your soul crystal at stake. I'm only here to help you reclaim your aether. If you think you can look after him by yourself, then by all means.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_100_016だが、もとより、)) (( )) 02 /var>のソウルクリスタルに、
エーテルを返すための人助けだ。
お前さえついていれば、道を違えずに目的が果たせよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_017<tab>As for me...I think I've finally regained enough strength to make the journey back to Ishgard. When you've finished in Gyr Abania, come and find us at the Forgotten Knight.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_017俺は、様子を見つつ、一旦イシュガルドに戻る。
ギラバニアでやるべきことが終わったら、
皇都で再合流するとしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_020<tab>Don't get cocky. The little bastard's a handful and a half.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_020おかげさまで、それなりには動ける。
のちほど、皇都で合流するとしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_RIELLE_000_025<tab>Myste cares for us all, in his own way, but you most of all, I think...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_RIELLE_000_025)) (( )) 02 /var>がついていてくれれば、
ミストはきっと平気だと思う……。
気をつけて行ってきてね。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_030<tab>Castrum Oriens... How it buzzes with life. So many brave soldiers, resolved to do their duty no matter the cost...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_030ここが、カストルム・オリエンス……！
みんな、てきぱき、おしごとしてるね……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_031<tab>But have no doubt there will be a cost, and it will be most high, for no man is beyond the reach of fate. Death will not be denied...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_031……戦いの準備なのかな……こわいな……。
それに、みんな、ぎらぎらしていて、
かなしそうなひと、いない……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_032<tab>This place...this place...it weighs on me... Anywhere but here I would search...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_032基地から、すこし、はなれたほうが、いい……？
しずかな場所……戦場跡のほう、さがしてみよう……？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_040<tab>Come...come to share the fire? I would stand to greet you, stranger, but my legs...my eyes...the whole of me is not what it once was...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_040ハァ……ハァ……誰か、そこにいるのか？
もう、目がかすんで……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_041<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...I know that name, and that voice! By Rhalgr, you're still alive! Praise Him, praise Him...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_041あんたは……)) (( )) 02 /var>さんじゃないか……！？
ハハ……こんな奇跡が、ある、とは……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_042<tab>Who is this man on the verge of death? Is he your friend?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_042たいへん……このひと、とてもよわってる……！
)) (( )) 02 /var>の、ともだち……？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_043<tab>Nay, nay, though I am flattered that you would think so...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_043よく、見えねぇが……可愛い声の、お連れさんだ……。
残念……俺は、友達なんて大層なものじゃない……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_044<tab>This <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> made medicine for me long, long ago, at the behest of Captain Meffrid...when we were still in Quarrymill.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_044)) (( )) 02 /var>さんは以前……
クォーリーミルで、メッフリッド隊長のもとにいた俺に、
薬をとどけてくださったんだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_045<tab>If I'd kept it all for myself, I'd've made a full recovery...but I couldn't. I had a dear friend, you see, and so I made a choice. He got better. I didn't.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_045その薬は、俺を……弱っていた仲間たちを救った……。
みんな感動して、救われた命で大義をなそう、って……
アラミゴ解放の先鋒だった、鉄仮面卿の部隊に志願したのさ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_046<tab>Ended up working for the Griffin, he did. As a right-hand man, even. But like all the rest who went to the Wall, he never came back.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_046結果は…………ご存知でしょう？
仲間たちは、みんな……長城の戦いで、死にました……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_047<tab>The irony of it, that I'd be the one to outlive them all, if only for a little while.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_047俺は、一命を、取り留めたんですが……
鉄仮面卿の一味なんぞ、今さら戻れる場所はありません……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_048<tab>And so I sit here and await the reckoning, as I rot from the inside out. The husk of the freedom fighter I aspired to be.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_048こうして片隅でひっそり生きていたものの、
ついに天罰が下ったらしい……。
どこからか、病をもらっちまって……もう終いです……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_049<tab>No, no! This is not the ending you deserve! I will not allow it!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_049<tab>だ、だめ……死んでしまうのは、だめ……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_050<tab>The man he spoke of, the one whose life he chose to save at the cost of his own. That man is proof of his nobility! If he were here...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_050)) (( )) 02 /var>、ぼく、このひとをはげましたい。
元気になって、生きてほしいの……。
「ちから」を、つかわせて……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_051<tab>Do you wish to see him again? Your dear friend?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_051お願い……元気を、だして……。
今、会いたいひとは、いませんか……？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_052<tab>Houdart? Aye, more than anything. But there's no point in praying for the impossible. He died with the rest. I'm sure of it.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_052……いるさ……いるとも……。
仲間たちみんなに会いたいが……
中でも親しかったフーダルトには、とくに会いたいねぇ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_053<tab>He was the Griffin's double, and one of his top commanders besides...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_053)) (( )) 02 /var>さんも、ご存じでしょう……。
あいつは、鉄仮面卿の影武者をしていたときに、
あんたに会ったと……喜んでいましたから……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_054<tab>You're a kind boy, you are, and I'm grateful for the company in these twilight hours. But there's no need to trouble yourself further. My time is nearly spent.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_054……といっても、例にもれず、あの戦いで死んだんだ。
ありがとうなぁ……優しいお連れさん……
こんな俺を……はげまそうと……してくれて……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_055<tab>Then spend the remainder thinking of better days, Gallien, and not dwelling on the deaths of me and mine.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_055<tab>……彼らの厚意に応えるためにも、生きるんだ、ガリエン。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_056<tab>Gods strike me down... Houdart? No, no, it can't be... This is naught more than a trick, an illusion... A lie...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_056うそ、だろ……。
フーダルト……お前が、いるのか…………？

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_057But...even if it is a lie...
Hear me, Houdart. I've a favor to ask of you. One final favor for a dying fool...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_057ああ…………。
幻でも、あの世からの迎えでも、なんでもいい……。
フーダルト……フーダルト……お前に頼みがあるんだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_058<tab>Return to the Reach. To Bloodstorm. Offer a prayer to our brothers there.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_058ラールガーズリーチに帰って……
死んだ仲間のために、祈りを捧げてやって、くれ……。
俺ぁもう、行けないが……それだけが、気がかりだったんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_059<tab>I will, Gallien. You have my word.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_059……わかった。
お前の分まで、祈ってこよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_060<tab>We should talk. Outside.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_060<tab>外で、話をさせていただいても……？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_070<tab>I have to believe...I have to believe...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_070いのり、ささげてきたら……
ガリエンは、元気に、なる……？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_075<tab>Will you go with Houdart? He has to make it. I've naught left but this...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_GALLIEN_000_075あんたも……行ってくれるんですか……？
ありがとう……これで、俺も……やっと………………。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_080<tab>To Meffrid and Gallien, you were larger than life. I always wanted to meet you...and here we are. Though I reckon this doesn't really count, does it?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_080……まさか、こんな形で、あなたと再会することになるとは。
私たちの戦いを見届けてほしいと言ったのに、
あのような形で終わり……本来ならば、会わせる顔もない。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_081<tab>If only I could go back and tell myself what a blind, bloody fool I was to place my trust in the Griffin. Maybe then Gallien wouldn't be dying alone.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_081あなたとしても、鉄仮面の残党に手を貸すなど不本意でしょう。
ですが……どうか助力をお願いできないでしょうか。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_082<tab>Listen, he hasn't got much time. I'll lead the way. The wilds between here and the Reach aren't too dangerous, but as you can see, I'm unarmed, so I'll not be any good to you in a fight.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_082私は、ガリエンの望みをかなえてやりたい。
しかし、このような丸腰では、野獣ひしめく荒野を抜けて、
ラールガーズリーチに行くことなどできますまい……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_083<tab>Nor will I, I fear. We will have to rely solely on you for protection...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_083ぼくからも、おねがい。
ガリエン、安心したら、きっと生きられる……。
その大剣で、フーダルト、護ってあげて……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_084<tab>Heh, I've no doubt you can keep us safe. You're the bleedin' Warrior of Light, after all! Let us be off!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_084ありがとう……本当にありがとうございます……。
では、ラールガーズリーチへ向かいます。
ガリエンの意識があるうちに……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_100<tab>Strong as ever, eh? Stronger even than you were that day, I reckon...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_100ありがとうございます……。
やはり、あなたがいてくださってよかった。
あの日も今も、本当にお強い方だ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_101<tab>They say that when the Griffin's men realized you were coming to stop them, they grew panicked and unsure. How could they take up arms against a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> hailed as the hero of Eorzea? A hero who had personally intervened in their lives for the better?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_101バエサルの長城で、私たちは、攻め入ってくるあなたを見た。
かつての恩人が懸命に戦う姿に、若干の迷いを覚えました。
そしてそれは……間もなく後悔へと変わることとなる。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_102<tab>Some stood their ground and died then and there for it, I imagine, while others looked the other way and tried to find some more imperials to kill. I pray I wasn't foolish enough to try and fight you. I owed you better...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_102あなたほどの強さがあれば、正しきを選べたのでしょうか。
救っていただいた命を燃やし、本当の意味で、
故郷と同胞を救うことができたノ、デショ、ウ、カ……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_103<tab>Houdart? Houdart! Speak to me!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_103ふらふら、してる、よ……？
だいじょうぶ……？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_104<tab>I'm fine... Just got dizzy all of a sudden. We have to hurry, do you hear me? We have to make it to the Reach!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_104失敬……問題ありません。
ですが、残念ながら話をしている時間はないようだ。
ラールガーズリーチへ急ぎましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_110<tab>Houdart has to stay strong! He has to remember what's at stake!
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_110<tab>フーダルト、が……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_120<tab>I made a promise...to Gallien... I will not fail you, brother...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_120ワタ、シ……ワタシ……ワタシ、ハ……
そう……キョてンに、戻らなければ……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_121<tab>It cannot be the distance. We haven't traveled far enough yet...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_121やっぱり、フーダルトのようす、おかしい……！
距離はまだ、へいきなはず、なのに……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_122<tab>A man's memories...cannot outlive him...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_122……私は所詮、ガリエンの想いの一部。
彼が見ている、夢のようなもの。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_123<tab>I told you, he hasn't...hasn't got much time. And neither do I...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_123ただの眠りについているなら、夢は在りつづけましょう。
しかし、彼は生死の狭間で浮き沈みしている。
そのまま死の底に沈めば、私も姿を保てまい……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_124<tab>I'll hold on as long as I can, but...in the end...it's not up to me...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_124やはり、急がねばなりません。
私は大丈夫です……行きましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_130<tab>No! I will not allow it! He will endure! We will fulfill Gallien's wish!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_130どうしよう……！
ぼくの「ちから」じゃ、想いは、おぎなえない……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_140<tab>So...so close...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_140…………マナイ……スマナイ……ミンナ……。
生キ、テ……故郷……コキョウ……もうイ、チ…………。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_141<tab>Houdart! You must go on! You must make Gallien whole! Remember, Houdart!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_141しっかり、して……！
フーダルト……ガリエン……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_142<tab>Don't you think I know that!? He...he saved my life! And I...we all went and died for naught! For naught! All we ever wanted was to go home...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_142ハァ……ハァ……だいじょうぶ、デ、す。
私たちに与えられた、この奇跡を、
こんなところで無駄にするわけには、いきません……。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_143O come ye wayward brothers,♪
Bereft of hearth and home,♪
Beneath yon burning star there lies♪
A haven for the bold...♪
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_143鉄仮面のもとに集った私たちは、確かに道を誤った……。
けれど皆、故郷を想う、いい連中だったんです。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_144Raise up your hands and voices!♪
Let fill your hearts with pride!♪
Above the churning waters we♪
Stand strong and unified!♪
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_144だから……歴史には、悪と記されても……
報われず、誰に救われることがナくトモ……
ワタシタチだけ、ハ……彼らのために、祈りたい……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_145<tab>...We can...we can still go home.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_145……こうして世界の片隅で朽ちかけたとき、
私たちは幾度も、あなたという暗影の中の光を見たんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_146<tab>Even now, after everything we have done, we can still go home...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_HOUDART_000_146どうかあと少しだけ……
チカラを……カシテくダ、サ、イ…………。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SYSTEM_000_150<tab>In the depths of the abyss, a flame lingers...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SYSTEM_000_150<tab>黒い靄が、渦巻いている……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_160<tab>He fell and would not rise. He began to shake and...and...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_160)) (( )) 02 /var>…………。
フーダルトが、とつぜんほどけて……
想いがとだえたんだ……だから……ガリエンも、もう……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_161<tab>He was so close! He could have made it─he should have made it! How cruel the gods to tempt us with this promise of redemption!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_161フーダルト、きせきって、いってたのに……。
だったら、死ななくても、よかった……
まにあって、みんな元気で幸せになっても、よかった……！

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_162<tab>We...we did not fail. They failed us...they failed us!
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_162こんなの、ちがうよ……。
きっと、ぼくがまた、失敗しただけ……。
もどったら、ガリエンは生きてて……それで……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_163<tab>They...we...I...
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_163<tab>それ、で…………。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_164<tab>Forgive me...forgive me... My failure is my own. I had my chance, and I squandered it. Reclaim that which was yours.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_164ごめん……ごめんね……。
これを、あなたに、戻してあげて。
本当に……ごめんなさい……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_170<tab>It was not mine to take, but I took it. For that is who I am at heart.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_170<tab>「ソウルイーター」で、これを、あなたに戻してあげて……。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SYSTEM_000_075Thus let me live, unseen, unknown;
Thus unlamented let me die;
Steal from the world, and not a stone
Tell where I lie.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SYSTEM_000_075すでに息を引き取っている……。
ガリエンのためにも、今なすべきことをしよう。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SYSTEM_000_180<tab>As the aether flows into your soul crystal once more, from the depths of the fading abyss, you hear a whisper...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SYSTEM_000_180ソウルイーターで、暗黒の靄を吸収した……。
暗黒騎士のソウルクリスタルに、エーテルが戻っていく……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_181<tab>...It is not finished. Not yet. You will come and pray with me.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_181……)) (( )) 02 /var>。
ぼくたちだけでも、いのり、ささげよう。
このさきだよね……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_190<tab>Here is where we are to pay <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>respect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to the dead.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_190<tab>ここに「黙祷」をささげれば、いい、よね……？

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SYSTEM_000_191A storm of blood approaches fast,
Hells open, Heavens weep.
For no one soul doth lie beyond
The measure of His Reach.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SYSTEM_000_191<tab>壊神「ラールガー」の石碑だ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_200<tab>...What good are prayers to the dead. They have not ears to listen.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_200<tab>……これで、フーダルトとガリエンは、むくわれたのかな。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_201<tab>Nor eyes to see or hearts to console. Naught remains of them save fleeting recollections soon lost to time and to the abyss...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_201わからない、よね。
死んでしまったら、そこでおわり。
無になったものを、だれも、かたれない……。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_202We are left only with pain.
A lingering sadness for names and faces consigned to oblivion.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_202……ぼくね、だいすきな「みんな」といて、
彼らのかなしみも、おそれも、知ってるはずだったの。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_203<tab>How are we to withstand this relentless onslaught which threatens to consume us? Is there no truth but this, that all men must die?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_203だけど、ぜんぜん、たりなかった。
喪失は、ときどきあなたたちを襲うんじゃなく、
いつだって、すぐとなりに、あるんだね……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_204<tab>Is this our world to suffer, or to shape?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_204<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>は、世界がそんなだって、知ってた……？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_Q1_000_205<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_Q1_000_205<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_A1_000_206<tab>The world is what we make of it. I by my sword. That is my truth.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_A1_000_206<tab>だから、この大剣をとった

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_A1_000_207<tab>Such is the gods' design.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_A1_000_207<tab>それは仕方のないことだ

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_208<tab>...Indeed. We are only bound by the gods' law by choice.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_208たいせつなものを護るための、大剣……。
そうだね、あなたたちは、そういうもの……だけど……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_209<tab>...But it need not be ours, do you see?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_209……そっか。
あなたも、たくさん、なくしてきたものね。

source:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_210We cannot save everyone, can we.
Sometimes, it is all we can do to save ourselves.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_210<tab>すくわれないなぁ……いつまでも…………。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_100_210<tab>Does any of it matter? What, if aught, have we wrought by our own hands?
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_100_210ぼくが、たった数回の人助けをすることにだって、
意味なんか、なかったかもしれない、ね……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_211<tab>One last time. I gave you my word, and I mean to keep it.
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_211<tab>……あのね、あと1回は、本当にさいごなの。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_212<tab>But know this. Every intervention has come at cost. A sacrifice. When I have finished, naught will remain of me.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_212ぼくは、あなたから、エーテルを借りた……。
それはすこしだけ嘘で、ぼくにはさいしょから、
あなたに借りたエーテルしかないの。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_213<tab>But...it does not have to be. For all our faults, for all our failures, we have made a difference. All the lives we have shattered, we can make them come together again.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_213だから、さいごの1回は、ぼくとひきかえ。
それでも、やっぱり、無意味だろうけれど……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_214<tab>Time and death, our true enemies, need hold no power over us. I can make a place for you in my world. You need only ask.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_214ぼくに、もっとたくさんの、エーテル……
つよい「ちから」があったなら、うまく、できたのかな……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_215<tab>We should go back to Ishgard. You must miss Sid and Rielle...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_215……かえろう、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
シドゥルグたち、皇都でまってるって、いってた。
きっと、心配、してるよ。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_RIELLE_000_220<tab>Is everything all right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_RIELLE_000_220<tab>おかえりなさい……？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_230<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I pray your trip to Gyr Abania was productive.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_230ああ、戻ったか……。
どうだ、そちらの状況は？

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_231<tab>...I'm sorry to hear that. I mean, I am glad you reclaimed more of your aether. I but wish the circumstances hadn't been so...depressing. For Myste's sake. We shall have to see how he is feeling when he returns.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_231……ふむ、今回の人助けの顛末はともかく、
ミストにエーテルがないというのは解せんな。
本人が戻ってきたら、詳しく聞く必要があるか……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_232<tab>Hm? No, as far as I am aware, he has yet to return to Ishgard. He certainly isn't here, as you can see.
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_232ミストは先に戻ったはず……？
いや、少なくともここには来ていないが……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_233<tab>...Oh, godsdammit. Don't tell me he decided to run away! And just when I was beginning to trust the little bastard... <sigh> No, no, I could still be wrong. He's earned a little trust. A few days' worth, no more...
target:
TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_SIDURGU_000_233チッ、今さらエーテルの持ち逃げでもなかろうに……！
どこで道草を食っているのか知らんが、
厄介ごとを連れずに戻ってくることを願うしかないか……。

source: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_090<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBDRK680_02918_MYSTE_000_090<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
